entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Connecting to IPAddress.Any via HTTP/3 #108259
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: "Failed to convert invalid RVA to offset: <N>" #108255
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: More file hash sum mismatches in crossgen comparison on windows x86 #108254
  • Download phase stalling. #108253
    10.0.0
  • Is it possible to prompt for user certificate selection on iOS in the same way we can prompt on Android using KeyChain.ChooseX509Certificate2WithPrivateKeyAsync #108252
  • Implement GC stress for R2R code. #108249
  • ARM64 SVE: mask conversion not always optimised away #108241
    10.0.0
  • No LogInformation is written. #108239
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Escaping user input text from curly braces to create correct Format from user input text #108238
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE: LoadVectorNonFaulting APIs require a mask due to FFR #108234
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE: Add Float/Double versions of the mask APIs #108233
  • STJ should allow setting naming policies on the member level. #108232
    Future
  • It should be possible `JsonIgnoreCondition`'s on the type level #108231
    Future
  • [Profiler] Ability to avoid `ICorProfilerCallback::ObjectsAllocatedByClass` callback when `COR_PRF_MONITOR_GC` is set. #108230
  • CastCache caches wrong values for IDynamicInterfaceCastable #108229
  • Support IDynamicInterfaceCastable with generic methods #108228
    Future
  • Significant performance difference between x += y and x = x + y on properties, differing between hardware and runtime version (7 / 8) #108227
    10.0.0
  • Uri.TryCreate Returns True For Uris That Are Not Absolute - Linux #108221

Closed

  • Test.CoreLib is missing DefaultMemberAttribute #107953
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Serialization of Empty Collections #108237
  • Is it possible to prompt for user certificate selection on iOS in the same way we can prompt on Android using KeyChain.ChooseX509Certificate2WithPrivateKeyAsync #108251
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Reverse<T>(T[]) #107723
    10.0.0
  • /azp run runtime-libraries-coreclr outerloop #108242
  • Any plan to add Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication #108223
  • [wasm] WebAssembly crashes if building with non-Release/Debug build config #101629
    8.0.x
  • vcpkg-init.sh fail in /bin/sh #108224
  • Application that targets .NET 4.8 does not support System.Data.SqlClient that targets .NET Standard 2.0 #107523
  • InlineArray documentation tracking #91012
    9.0.0
  • arm32 Required Version trouble #89556

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Add DefaultMemberAttribute to Test.CoreLib #108258
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #108257
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Reduce funceval abort #108256
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add runtime check for unwind get_proc_info_in_range #108250
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108248
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Add fuzzer for Convert.To/FromBase64 APIs #108247
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108246
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Bring back Microsoft.BCL.Memory netstandard2.1 facade #108245
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108244
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #108235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update `field` references in property accessors #108222
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Add DefaultMemberAttribute to Test.CoreLib #108236
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107810
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Reduce funceval abort #108220
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update field references in property accessors #108225
    needs-area-label
  • Implement Enumerable.Reverse(TSource[]) #107957
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108209
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Fix fingerprinting and loadAllSatelliteResources=true #108198
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable GC double reporting detection #107986
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix small typo in Y2038 doc #108240
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0] Fix createdump 'stack smashing detected' error on arm64 #108208
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support getting thread id in GC #108207
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix passing parameter to test added in #108190 #108199
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • `WasmBuildTest` can exit with negative code #108181
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Update `field` references in property accessors #108219
    area-Meta
  • InlineArray design spec/doc #108044
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices

Updated

  • Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #107852
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #108006
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2545882 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • NativeAOT Thread Name #107943
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check if lock is orphaned in GetThreadOwningMonitorLock #107168
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove HelperMethodFrame from `Delegate` construction #108217
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add Message property to ExperimentalAttribute #108216
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #108156
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108218
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [iOS] Enable and disable tests for hybrid globalization on Apple #108187
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Stored the initial capacity of the ConcurrentDictionary for correctly sizing the backing array after clearing the collection. #108065
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x

entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Title #43700
  • Migrate off of using `$(OS)` in favor of explicit System.OperatingSystem checks in the build targets #43693
  • Tamam #43689
  • Update sdk to use new Arcade .deb creation tooling #43688
  • 'Microsoft/Microsoft.h' file not found issue in .net maui project #43686
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24470.13] Fail to build Text-Grab App with CS0116, CS1514, CS1022, CS0118, CS0103 error . #43680
  • Support Json format for `dotnet new list` #43679

Closed

  • Problem with `dotnet restore` on Windows 11 ARM (via Mac / Parallels) #43691

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Lock comments for Windows setup #43699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Always disable NuGet auditing in source-only build #43696
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] BinSkim: Enable CFG #43695
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add pass 2 specifications for sdk projects #43694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WebSdk: new 'OneDeploy' publish method #43690
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Test the new nuget restore #43687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43677
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Report msbuild diagnostics as warnings/errors. #43571
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2546652 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime, dotnet/aspnetcore and windowsdesktop codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve logging from agent #43672
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • fix parsing of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Support additional VS component IDs for workloads #43675
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove WorkloadManifestValidator stub project #43642
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43673
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `NullableWalker.Scan().getFieldSymbolToBeInitialized()`: Is checking IsAutoProperty sufficient or should we check the appropriate accessors are missing or auto-implemented #75245
  • Implement nullable analysis for `field` keyword #75244
  • Linux Arm64 build csc hangs with 9.0.100-rc.1 SDK #75243
  • [LSP] Do not recompute syntax diagnostics if syntax has not changed #75241
  • [LSP] Return the same resultId if the diagnostic report is the same #75240
  • Compiler should error when it hits native PDB writer limits #75237
    17.13
  • XML Literal Hot Reload Issue #75231

Closed

  • [IDE0004] False positive for null literal in interpolated string #75145
    Backlog
  • IDE0002 suggests simplifying generated classes to their base class #75162
    Backlog
  • Property pattern fails on Nullable types #75238
  • Unified Build control update #63667
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35324.256 #75230

PullRequests

Created

  • Short term field keyword nullable analysis #75246
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix crash in 'use collection initializer' #75242
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove allocations in ErorrFacts #75234
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change rename command handler's behavior #75229
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge features/field-keyword into main #75228
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue removing unnecessary cast in user defined interpolation handlers #75236
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not simplify type name to a type with the EditorBrowsable attribute on it. #75235
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75239
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use MSBuild globs to determine which file changes are relevant #75139
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75220
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Allow <code> in DocComments to render as a block in Hover response #75215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Field-backed properties: interface properties #75219
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main into features/field-keyword #75227
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Move Quick Info content production to the Features layer and add Razor EA co-hosting APIs for Hover and Completion #75226
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs #75172
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add option for LSP-based auto insert #75224
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Stabilize lsp workspace diagnostic test #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Verify that semantic snippets obey IDE preferences #75073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Mark ISourceGenerator as obsolete for implementation #75223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot Create A DataRow Object #58077

  • Title #58083
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #58082

  • Title #58080
  • Title #58084

Merged

    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

    area-infrastructure
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 10.0-preview1

    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebView causes empty window popup and closes immediately #24933
  • .net8 maui ios app crashing on startup on actual device #24932
  • The picker allows you to write text if the keyboard is visible #24930
  • [Performance] DatePicker/TimePicker first render is too slow #24929
  • Content is not render properly when the 'Don't keep activities' setting is enabled #24927
  • The text entered in the Entry is not visible when using Handlers with BaseInputConnection while the Predictive Text option is enabled in the keyboard settings on Samsung devices. #24926
  • Toggled Command is always called 1 more time when a new window is opened #24925
  • [Windows]The border color of the input controls does not update when the theme changes. #24923
  • Accessibility iOS - Editor - Has 2 focusable components #24921
  • ListView with Grid in Data Template. GridUnitType.Star not specify a proportional size. #24920
  • Evaluate if StreamImageSourceService fails to read the stream if we should still throw #24917
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • Vertical ScrollBar is not visible until scrolled in Android platform. #24894
  • Upgrade from 8.0.70 to 8.0.82 Apple reports apple push notifications are being used. #24880
  • Can't release the C# object referenced by razor component in BlazorWebView #23654
  • [net9.0] MAUI new project doesn't have deploy checked for android configuration on Windows #24452
    9.0-rc2
  • Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #23333
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Android ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc2` #24566
    9.0-rc2
  • [WebAuthenticator] [Android 14] The redirection does not work after authentication #24904
  • Disabling RefreshView disables all underlying controls #24918
  • IOS Binding Library - the native class hasn't been loaded. #24881
  • Picker ItemDisplayBinding doesn't work with compiled bindings #23989
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible property in Shell Items is always true #24797
    Backlog
  • Visual State manager change in behavior in 8.0.90 breaks "Normal" #24849
    .NET 8 SR9

PullRequests

Created

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20240925231640755 to net9.0 #24935
  • [UITesting] Moved ButtonHandler.ImageSourceInitializesCorrectly to Appium #24934
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [XC] Add feature switch to enable compiling bindings with source #24924
    area-xaml, 9.0-rc2
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml SR9.1 #24931
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Android Ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc.2` #24665
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Revert: Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate remote notification methods #24907
  • [X] Ignore Parent DataType on collection #24530
    area-xaml
  • [C] fix specificity comparison #24891

Updated

  • Re-enable tests #24912
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • AppThemeBinding on ToolbarItems #24886
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-menubar
  • Update default `BlazorWebView` host address #24884
    area-blazor
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, 9.0-rc2
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #24817
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Text alignment in editor - improvements #24859
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    community ✨
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` (take 2) #24695
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-keyboard, t/perf
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for the CollectionView to prevent duplicate groups or crashes when adding a new item to a group or when adding a new group. #24873
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Speed-up Border rendering by avoiding useless pass during size allocation #24844
    community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible property in Shell Items is always true #24871
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Request: Add EF.Functions.DateTimeOffsetFromDateTime #34756
  • Query/JSON: ordering JSON collection using Order (or OrderBy(x => x)) fails during translation #34755
  • Error generating query with nullable decimal sum #34753
  • JsonElement not supported with Sqlite #34752

Closed

  • `Contains` on `IQueryable<string>` seems to consistently evaluate to FALSE. #34738
  • Migration source generator #34739
    Backlog
  • Consider ensuring that split query ordering is deterministic, either warning/throwing if not or injecting the primary key properties #34722
  • Using ToString() on a value object causes unnecesssary case expression in query #34750
  • Does sql server provide support new JSON data type? #34754

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34746
  • [release/9.0] Fix to #34728 - Split query with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #34743
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Fix: Value cannot be null parameter name key #34730
    waiting-for-response
  • better perf in SupportedMethods calculation in SqlServerConvertTransl… #34421
  • use switch for SqlServerDateOnlyMemberTranslator #34417
  • Translate COALESCE as ISNULL #34171
  • Add SqlServer DATEPART support for Microsecond and Nanosecond properties. #34135
  • [WIP] Translation of TimeOnly.FromTimeSpan on SQL Server no-op #34114
  • Improved nested SelectMany with DefaultIfEmpty #34110
  • Enable `Resolve_scoped_application_service` test #34129
  • Prefer equality in boolean comparisons #34166
  • Avoid duplicating complex expression in comparisons #34172
  • Add support for database window functions - WIP #34258
  • remove repeated IsGenericMethod and GetGenericMethodDefinition in SqlServerByteArrayMethodTranslator #34419
  • thoughts on caching argumentsPropagateNullability arrays? #34422
  • Added Support for translating Array.IndexOf methods for byte arrays for SqlServer & SQLite #34457
  • Associate the DatabaseRoot with the scoped options instance and not the singleton options. #34477
  • In VisitUpdate, match table by alias rather than the exact same instance #34601
  • Optimize DISTINCT over collections of 0 or 1 element #34702
  • Use right hand type mapping for more binary expressions when left is an object #34729
  • Make sort order consistent in split queries #34097
